channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 2x Sign posts on ground, 1st October
item.description:
The keep left sign post opposite the car wash is on the ground. Near to it towards Dartford is a post leaning against the fence which seems to be rotten at the base.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Northend Road, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Some small holes to patch up underneath swings, 1st October
item.description:
Glad to see new child friendly footing in this park - it looks great and very welcome, but can these small holes underneath the swings be patched up please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glebe Knoll, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead trees to be removed, 1st October
item.description:
I have reported these some time ago. If dead these trees can be removed then some new whips could be planted here in due course?

Please clean up

item.title: Fake "DISABLED " writing on a residents bay, 1st October
item.description:
The fake "Disabled " writing in front of a regular parking bay was done by the owner of the white truck in the picture. He is not Disabled. He is avoiding parking tickets daily , by taking down his number plates. Parks every day and overnight illegally and lives on the estate. Doesn't want to pay for residents permit, and uses drop key to let himself through the barrier. His number plate is: CT19NPZ There are no designated Disabled residents parking bays.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): John Aird Court, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Advertising signs for Paramount Paving? attached to street furniture, 30th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swingate Lane, Plumstead, London

item.title: Persistent use of parking bay, 30th September
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Semley Gate, Hackney, London
